plot: Ghosts....something everybody has seen....or will some day.  No one knows how long the word ghost has been around...
title: Pee Kao Pee Ook
plot_es: Ghosts....something everybody has seen....or will some day.  No one knows how long the word ghost has been around...
plot_en: Ghosts....something everybody has seen....or will some day.  No one knows how long the word ghost has been around...
